You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesR R] > &rcy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Rcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0420/index.htm U+00420].
  * `&rcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0440/index.htm U+00440].
